md:
giải nghĩa từ "appear" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* appear (verb) : xuất hiện, hiện ra
	+ Meaning: to become visible or to be seen
	+ Example: The ghost appeared in the mirror.
	+ Related words: disappear, reappear, appearance
	+ Antonyms: disappear, vanish

* appear (verb) : dường như, có vẻ
	+ Meaning: to seem or give the impression of something
	+ Example: He appears to be very happy.
	+ Related words: seem, look, appear to be
	+ Antonyms: seem not, appear not

* appear (verb) : xuất hiện trước công chúng, ra mắt
	+ Meaning: to perform or present oneself in public
	+ Example: The singer will appear on stage tonight.
	+ Related words: perform, present, debut
	+ Antonyms: cancel, postpone

* appear (noun) : diện mạo, vẻ ngoài
	+ Meaning: the way someone or something looks
	+ Example: Her appearance was stunning.
	+ Related words: look, face, figure
	+ Antonyms: ugliness, unattractiveness
html:
giải nghĩa từ "appear" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • appear (verb) : xuất hiện, hiện ra

    • Meaning: to become visible or to be seen
    • Example: The ghost appeared in the mirror.
    • Related words: disappear, reappear, appearance
    • Antonyms: disappear, vanish

  • appear (verb) : dường như, có vẻ

    • Meaning: to seem or give the impression of something
    • Example: He appears to be very happy.
    • Related words: seem, look, appear to be
    • Antonyms: seem not, appear not

  • appear (verb) : xuất hiện trước công chúng, ra mắt

    • Meaning: to perform or present oneself in public
    • Example: The singer will appear on stage tonight.
    • Related words: perform, present, debut
    • Antonyms: cancel, postpone

  • appear (noun) : diện mạo, vẻ ngoài

    • Meaning: the way someone or something looks
    • Example: Her appearance was stunning.
    • Related words: look, face, figure
    • Antonyms: ugliness, unattractiveness
